monster.title: Galvanice Weird
monster.monsterResist: cold, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.monsterConditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.209
monster.monsterTrait2: Death Burst. When the galvanice weird dies, it explodes in a burst of ice and lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding weird must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
monster.monsterAction1: Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 5 (ld6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or lose the ability to use reactions until the start of the weird's next turn.

monster.title: Category 1 Krasis
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.210
monster.monsterTrait2: Amphibious. The krasis can breathe air and water.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
monster.monsterAction2: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (ldl0 + 3) piercing damage.
monster.monsterAction3: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach S ft., one target. Hit: 7 {ld8 + 3) slashing damage.

monster.title: Category 2 Krasis
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.211
monster.monsterTrait2: Amphibious. The krasis can breathe air and water.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
monster.monsterAction2: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 t o hit , reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (2dl2 + 4) piercing damage.
monster.monsterAction3: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2dl 2 + 4) slashing damage

monster.title: Category 3 Krasis
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.212
monster.monsterTrait2: Amphibious. The krasis can breathe air and water.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The krasis makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws , and one with its tail
monster.monsterAction2: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (6d6 + 6) piercing damage.
monster.monsterAction3: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3dl0 + 6) slashing damage.
monster.monsterAction4: Tail. Melee Weapon Attack:+ 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (6d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monster.title: Kraul Warrior
monster.monsterLanguages: Kraul , understands Common but can't speak it
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.213
monster.monsterTrait2: Hive Mind. The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.
monster.monsterTrait3: Pack Tactics. The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
monster.monsterTrait4: Spider Climb. The kraul can climb difficult surfaces , including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
monster.monsterAction1: Spear. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/ 60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (ld6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 {ld8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.title: Kraul Death Priest
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.214
monster.monsterTrait2: Feed on Death. When a creature within 30 feet of the kraul drops to 0 hit points, the kraul or another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it gains 5 (ldl0) temporary hit points, provided the kraul isn't incapacitated.
monster.monsterTrait3: Hive Mind. The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.
monster.monsterTrait4: Innate Spellcasting. The kraul's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The kraul can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: chill touch, poison spray 3/day each: ray of enfeeblement, ray of sickness l/day each: animate dead, blight, vampiric touch
monster.monsterTrait5: Pack Tactics. The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
monster.monsterTrait6: Spider Climb. The kraul can climb difficult surfaces , including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The kraul makes one attack with its quarterstaff and casts one of its spells with a casting time of l action
monster.monsterAction2: Quarterstaff. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (ld8 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands

monster.title: Nightveil Specter
monster.monsterResist: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.215
monster.monsterTrait2: Mount. If the specter isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto its gloamwing mount, provided the specter and the gloamwing are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the specter appears astride the gloamwing along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While moun ted and not incapacitated, the specter can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The specter makes two scythe attacks
monster.monsterAction2: Scythe. Melee Weapon Attack: + 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit : 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.
monster.monsterAction3: Mind Twist (Recharge 5-6). The specter magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succee d on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (5d8) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving th row at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
monster.monsterAction4: Reap Memory (3/Day). The specter touches one incapacitated creature and chooses 1 hour from among the past 24 . Unless the creature succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw, the creature loses all memory of that hour. The creature regains the memory only if the specter dies within the next 24 hours.

monster.title: Gloamwing
monster.monsterResist: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.215
monster.monsterTrait2: Death Link. If its specter rider is reduced to 0 hit points. the gloamwing is destroyed.
monster.monsterTrait3: Flyby. The gloamwing doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach
monster.monsterTrait4: Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the gloamwing has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The gloamwing makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
monster.monsterAction2: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage
monster.monsterAction3: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

monster.title: Nivix Cyclops
monster.monsterConditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

monsterReaction.name: Spell Vitalization.
monsterReaction.text: Immediately after a creature casts a spell of 1st level or higher within 120 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops can move up to twice its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then make one slam attack against a target of its choice.

monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.216
monster.monsterTrait2: Magic Resistance. The cyclops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The cyclops makes two slam attacks.
monster.monsterAction2: Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit : 23 (3d10 + 7 ) bludgeoning damage

monster.title: Simic Hybrid Brute
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.216
monster.monsterTrait2: Amphibious. The hybrid can breathe air and water.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The hybrid makes two claw attacks.
monster.monsterAction2: Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (ld6 + 4) slashing damage.

monster.title: Simic Hybrid Flier
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.216
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.
monster.monsterAction2: javelin. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld6 + 3) piercing damage
monster.monsterAction3: Spit Acid. Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (4d4) acid damage

monster.title: Simic Hybrid Poisoner
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.216
monster.monsterTrait2: Assassinate. During its first turn, the hybrid poisoner has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the hybrid scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.
monster.monsterTrait3: Poisonous Skin. Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (ld6) poison damage.
monster.monsterAction1: Toxic Touch. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for l minute. At the end of each of the poisoned target's turns, it must repeat the save, taking 3 (ld6) poison damage on a fa iled save, or ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

monster.title: Simic Hybrid Shocker
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.217
monster.monsterTrait2: Electrified Body. Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (ldl0) lightning damage.
monster.monsterTrait3: Illumination. The hybrid sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The hybrid makes two attacks: one with its shocking touch and one with its tentacles.
monster.monsterAction2: Shocking Touch. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage
monster.monsterAction3: Tentacles. Melee Weapon Attack: + 4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 11), and the hybrid pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward it. Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 (1 dlO) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the hybrid shocker can't use its tentacles on another creature.

monster.title: Simic Hybrid Spy
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.217
monster.monsterTrait2: Chameleon Skin. The hybrid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.
monster.monsterTrait3: Spider Climb. The hybrid can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The hybrid makes two shortsword attacks.
monster.monsterAction2: Shortsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit , reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld6 + 3) piercing damage

monster.title: Skyjek Roc
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.219
monster.monsterTrait2: Keen Sight. The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.
monster.monsterAction2: Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (ld8 + 5) piercing damage
monster.monsterAction3: Talons. Melee Wea pon Attack: +7 to hit , reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage

monster.title: Skyswimmer
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.220
monster.monsterTrait2: Amphibious. The skyswimmer can brea the air and water.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The skyswimmer makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.
monster.monsterAction2: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack:+ 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3dl0 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the skyswimmer. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the skyswimmer, and it takes 21 (6d6} acid damage at the start of each of the skyswimmer's turns. If the skyswimmer takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the skyswimmer must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within l0 feet of the skyswimmer. If the skyswimmer dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using l5 feet of movement, exiting prone.
monster.monsterAction3: Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +ll to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d l 2 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

monster.title: Servitor Thrull

monsterReaction.name: Self-Sacrifice.
monsterReaction.text: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.221
monster.monsterAction1: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5(ld8 + 1) slashing damage

monster.title: Winged Thrull

monsterReaction.name: Self-Sacrifice.
monsterReaction.text: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.221
monster.monsterAction1: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.
monster.monsterAction2: Rock. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (ld6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monster.title: Undercity Medusa
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.222
monster.monsterTrait2: Innate Spellcasting. The medusa's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (s pell save DC 14). The medusa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: l/day each: expeditious retreat, fog cloud, misty step
monster.monsterTrait3: Magic Resistance The medusa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
monster.monsterTrait4: Surprise Attack During the first round of combat, the medusa has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is surprised, and it deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage each time it hits such a creature with an attack
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The medusa makes two claw attacks. It can also use Petrifying Gaze before or after making these attacks
monster.monsterAction2: Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
monster.monsterAction3: Petrifying Gaze. The medusa fixes its gaze on one creature within 60 feet of it that it can see and that can see its eyes. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a fa ilure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

monster.title: Blood Drinker Vampire
monster.monsterResist: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.monsterLanguages: the languages it knew in life

monsterReaction.name: Parry.
monsterReaction.text: The vampire adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the vampire must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.223
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The vampire makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack
monster.monsterAction2: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. Hit: 7 (ld6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be charmed by the vampire for l minute. While charmed in this way, the target is infatuated with the vampire. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target fi nishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
monster.monsterAction3: Rapier. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach S ft., one target. Hit: 8 (ld8 + 4) piercing damage.
monster.monsterAction4: Unarmed Strike. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (ld8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape DC 14) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

monster.title: Mind Drinker Vampire
monster.monsterLanguages: the languages it knew in life
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.224
monster.monsterTrait2: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics). The vampire's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: At will: message 3/day each: charm person, hold person, mirror image, sleep l/day each: gaseous form, major image
monster.monsterTrait3: Shadow Stealth. While in dim light or darkness, the vampire can take the Hide action as a bonus action
monster.monsterTrait4: Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the vampire has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
monster.monsterAction1: Multiattack. The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.
monster.monsterAction2: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. Hit: 7 (ld6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be charmed by the vampire for l minute. While charmed in this way, the target is infatuated with the vampire. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target fi nishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
monster.monsterAction3: Unarmed Strike. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (ld8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape DC 14) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.
monster.monsterAction4: Mind Siphon (Recharge 5-6). The vampire targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw, with disadvantage if the vampire has previously consumed the target's blood. On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage, and the vampire discerns the target's surface emotions and thoughts. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the vampire discerns the target's general emotional state but not its thoughts.

monster.title: Wurm
monster.monsterTrait1: Source Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, p.225
monster.monsterTrait2: Earth Tremors. The wurm creates earth tremors as it moves overland or underground. Any creature that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Any structure or object anchored to the ground that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn takes 10 (3d6) force damage
monster.monsterTrait3: Siege Monster. The wurm deals double damage to objects and structures.
monster.monsterTrait4: Tunneler. The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.
monster.monsterAction1: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (5d6 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the wurm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wurm, and takes 17 (5d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns. If the wurm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wurm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wurm. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.
